verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse:
Lord, if I find favor in Your sight
Lord, please hear my heart's cry
I'm desperately waiting to be where You are
I'll cross the hottest desert, I'll travel near or far

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
For Your glo - ry I will do anything
Just to see You, to behold You as my King

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus: (after key change)
For Your glo - ry I will do anything
Just to see You, to behold You as my King

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
Send the winds of refreshing, God, send Your Spirit
Send the winds of refreshing, God, send Your glory down

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Bridge:
Send the winds of refreshing, God, send Your Spirit
Send the winds of refreshing, God, send Your glory down
